"""Represent the Common Workflow Language types."""

import attr

from renga._compat import Path

from ._ascwl import CWLClass



[docs]@attr.s
class File(CWLClass):
    """Represent a file."""

    path = attr.ib(converter=Path)

    def __str__(self):
        """Simple conversion to string."""
        return str(self.path)
